subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Wes Welker slipped through the Bills secondary for 16 catches and 217 yards, but a field goal gave Buffalo a 34-31 victory and its first 3-0 start since 1992.
snippet: Wes Welker slipped through the Bills secondary for 16 catches and 217 yards, but a field goal gave Buffalo a 34-31 victory and its first 3-0 start since 1992.
